welcometext:
Hi, I am here to help you run automation suites for the payments team. You can get my attention by typing my name and a request. At this point, I can help you lookup what test suites can be run, and actually running them. 

For example, to find out what suites are available, you can ask "@Payments Automation Bot what suites are available?"
For another example, to run a suite, you can type "@Payments Automation Bot run <suitename>"

You can enter "@Payments Automation Bot help" anytime you need some help.

You can also open a direct message with me if you want to keep our interaction private.

Enjoy!
helptext:
To run a suite: "@Payments Automation Bot run <suitename>"
To get a list of suites I can run for you: "@Payments Automation Bot give me a list of suites"

If you need some human help, ask Sam Hall :(
